arm_group.description: Women with endometriosis compared to women without endometriosis. Different samples will be collected (blood, follicular fluid, cells from the uterus)

biospec_descr.textblock:
Blood samples for inflammatory markers, hormones and genetic testing. Follicular fluid for
      inflammatory markers. Cells from the uterus for testing of different additives and what
      characterize cells from women with endometriosis compared to controls.

brief_summary.textblock:
To investigate parameters related to fertility in women with endometriosis in relation to
      food items.

detailed_description.textblock:
The study has been reviewed and accepted by the legal registrations in Denmark (The Regional
      Committee on Biomedical Research Ethics and The Danish Dataprotection Agency). The data will
      be anonymous and kept as described by the Danish register law.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Fertility patients

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  mental challenges

study_pop.textblock:
Women attending an infertility Clinic, some with endometriosis compared to women without
        endometriosis

clinical_study.official_title: A Study on the Differences in Inflammatory Markers Between Women With Endometriosis and Women Without in Relation to Fertility and Food Consumption.

overall_official.affiliation: Professor, Consultant at the Fertility Clinic, Arhus University Hospital

authority: Denmark: The Regional Committee on Biomedical Research Ethics

primary_outcome.measure: The level of Free Fatty Acid in follicular fluid will be different in women with endometriosis compared to controls
primary_outcome.time_frame: The fluid will be collected, frozen and tested december 2014

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

secondary_outcome.description: The cells will be collected from infertile women with or without endometriosis, frozen and tested later.
secondary_outcome.measure: methylation pattern of specific genes in the endometrium
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Collecting of cells and testing december 2014

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Case Control, Time Perspective: Prospective
